document_data.mainbody:
Ardogh Stonegrip was a barbarian who worked at the Dryads Dreams of Mosstone in Tethyr.
Ardogh Stonegrip was a mountainous man.
Ardogh was one of the male escorts who worked at Dryads Dreams in the late 14 century DR. Along with several men and women who offered their services and companionship at the only festhall in Mosstone. Ardogh stood out among his peers for his sheer size and musculature, while his fellow courtesan Chalavon Narthiir was known for his slender build and quick mind.
